Advancement Screenshot.description: A client-side mod which takes a screenshot every time a player achieves an advancement.

All Loot Drops.description: A minimalistic mod that has entities always drop all their possible loot in a configurable amount.

Altered Damage.description: A minimalistic configurable mod that alters damage taken with a modifier by players and other entities.

Alternative World Save Location.description: Allows changing the default save location of Minecraft worlds to outside the instance scope.

Always a Wither Skull.description: A drag-and-drop mod that makes wither skeletons always drop their skull on death.

Anvil Restoration.description: Adds the ability to repair placed anvils with iron ingots and destroy them with obsidian.

Areas.description: Create custom named areas/towns with a radius using signs, which sends join and leave messages.

Automatic Doors.description: Automatically opens doors in front of the player and closes them with a configurable delay.

Beautified Chat Client.description: A highly configurable mod to change the style and colour of incoming chat messages on the client.

Beautified Chat Server.description: A highly configurable mod to change the style and colour of incoming chat messages server-wide.

Better Beacon Placement.description: Easily place beacon bases by right-clicking the beacon with a mineral block plus other tweaks.

Better Conduit Placement.description: Place conduits in front of you, place blocks by clicking the conduit and other tweaks.

Better Spawner Control.description: A drag-and-drop mod which disables mob spawners whenever they are surrounded by 5 torches.

Bigger Sponge Absorption Radius.description: Each extra sponge block placed next to another increases the water absorption radius.

Bottle Your Xp.description: A minimalistic configurable mod that allows the creation of experience bottles from your own gathered xp.

Bottled Air.description: Allows players to breathe in empty glass bottles underwater to get more air, configurable.

Bouncier Beds.description: Makes players bounce configurably higher on beds and prevents fall damage on them.

Breedable Killer Rabbit.description: A minimalistic configurable mod which makes the killer rabbit tamable and available by breeding.

Campfire Spawn and Tweaks.description: Allows player to set spawn points inside a campfire, gives fire resistance on respawn and does some other tweaks.

Collective.description: Collective is a shared library with common code for all of Serilum's mods.

Compact Help Command.description: Modifies the standard /help command to be colourful and have multiple pages.

Conduits Prevent Drowned.description: Disables drowned zombie spawns around the player when the conduit effect is active.

Configurable Despawn Timer.description: Allows items to remain on the ground longer or shorter than the default lifespan.

Configurable Extra Mob Drops.description: Add extra drops to any (modded) mob entity via commands and a config file.

Configurable Furnace Burn Time.description: Allows users to change the fuel burn time in a furnace globally via a config.

Configurable Mob Potion Effects.description: Configurably set potion effects for all living entities, permanent for self and on damage for others.

Creative Block Replacer.description: Allows easy switching in between placing and replacing blocks in creative mode.

Crying Ghasts.description: Ghasts drop their tears periodically when a player is close, giving the ability to farm them sustainably.

Crying Portals.description: Extends the blocks allowed for nether portal creation to use normal and crying obsidian.

Cycle Paintings.description: Easily cycle through placed paintings by right-clicking them with another painting.

Death Backup.description: Creates a backup of an inventory right before a player death, which can be loaded via a command.

Despawning Eggs Hatch.description: Allows chicken eggs on a hay block to hatch into a chick baby just before they despawn.

Difficulty Lock.description: Sets the difficulty to peaceful/easy/normal/hard in any (new) world, optionally locked.

Dismount Entity.description: Allows players to dismount/remove/exit entities/mobs from mounted entities.

Double Doors.description: Adds the ability for identical double doors, trapdoors and fence gates to be opened simultaneously via click or pressure plates and buttons.

Dragon Drops Elytra.description: A minimalistic mod that makes the Ender Dragon drop an elytra on death.

Easy Elytra Takeoff.description: Allows easy taking off by elytra with a firework from the ground without that awkward jump.

Edibles.description: Makes lots of ingredients edible, after which the player receives a short status effect.

Enchanting Commands.description: Adds the /ec command, which allows for easy creation of enchanted items via commands with levels above the default limit.

End Portal Recipe.description: Makes the end portal craftable and available in survival plus other tweaks.

Entity Information.description: Displays entity information on hit with the Information Stick. Useful for debugging and developing. Usage: /informationstick or /ist

Eroding Stone Entities.description: When stone-type entities are left in flowing water for some time they turn into sand.

Extended Bone Meal.description: Extends bone meal behaviour. Instant grow with sneak, grow netherwart and other tweaks.

Extended Creative Inventory.description: Adds all items which by default aren't in the creative inventory to a custom Extended tab.

Extract Poison.description: Allows the extraction of poison from cave spiders, pufferfish and bees with an empty bottle.

Fall Through Slime.description: Slime blocks no longer support your weight when standing still, and you'll slowly fall through.

Fire Spread Tweaks.description: Disables the default firespread, but does make fire go out on its own after a configurable delay.

First Join Message.description: Sends players who join a world for the first time a configurable message.

Fish On The Line.description: Rings the bell held in your offhand when you are fishing and something's on the line.

Fixed Anvil Repair Cost.description: Allows setting the level and material cost of repairing an item on an anvil to always be the same configurable amount and also allows setting how much percent is repaired.

Full Brightness Toggle.description: [Client] Press G to instantly toggle the brightness/gamma in-game to full.

Furnace Recycle.description: Makes all metal-containing items in the game recyclable in a furnace.

Giant Spawn.description: Allows the giant to spawn naturally and other tweaks.

Grass Seeds.description: Allows the use of wheat seeds to transform dirt blocks to grass blocks and to create (tall) grass on them.

Grindstone Sharper Tools.description: The grindstone can sharpen tools, temporarily increasing their damage dealt.

GUI Clock.description: Shows the time and days played in the GUI on the screen with a clock in the inventory.

GUI Compass.description: Shows the direction and coordinates in the GUI with a compass in the inventory.

GUI Followers.description: [Client] Shows a list in the GUI/HUD with all tamed non-sitting followers around the player.

Hand Over Your Items.description: Adds to ability to give other players items without dropping them on the floor.

Healing Campfire.description: Creates an area around the campfire where players and passive mobs receive the regeneration effect in a configurable radius.

Healing Soup.description: Soup heals hearts. Adds cactus soup, mushroom soup and chocolate milk items and recipes.

Hidden Recipe Book.description: Hides the recipe book in all crafting GUI's.

Hide Hands.description: Hide your offhand and/or mainhand, always or while holding specific items.

Hoe Tweaks.description: Makes various changes to hoe mechanics. Faster crop block breaking, increased hoe radius and be able to un-till soil.

Humbling Bundle.description: A minimalistic mod that doubles all dropped entity loot.

Husk Spawn.description: Adds a chance for husks to spawn naturally everywhere instead of a zombie.

Ice Prevents Crop Growth.description: Crops growing on tilled soil with an ice block underneath will never grow to the next stage, for design purposes.

Infinite Trading.description: Prevents villager and wandering trader trades from locking up, making them be always available.

Inventory Totem.description: Makes the totem of undying effect work when existing in the player's inventory.

Just Mob Heads.description: A minimalistic mod that adds a configurable chance for mobs to drop their respective heads on death.

Just Player Heads.description: A minimalistic mod that adds a configurable chance for players to drop their respective heads on death and via a command. All heads are generated with texture-data.

Keep My Soil Tilled.description: Keeps soil tilled below a stem block (melon/pumpkin) after harvesting.

Kelp Fertilizer.description: Kelp seaweed has a cell structure that filters sea water for rich nutrients. It can now act as a fertilizer like bone meal.

Milk All The Mobs.description: Allows sheep, llamas, pigs, donkeys, horses and mules to produce a bucket of milk.

Mineral Chance.description: Adds a chance to find a random mineral inside a stone block when mining.

Mooshroom Spawn.description: Adds a chance for mooshrooms to spawn naturally everywhere in place of a cow.

Mooshroom Tweaks.description: A minimalistic mod that tweaks the spawning behaviour of mooshrooms, allowing both red and brown to spawn naturally.

More Zombie Villagers.description: Allows modifying the default chance a zombie spawn is of the villager variant.

Move Boats.description: Allows players to easily move boats without breaking them by holding right click.

Move Minecarts.description: Allows players to easily pick up and move minecarts without breaking them by holding right click.

Name Tag Tweaks.description: Adds name tag crafting recipe, /nametag command, and named entities drop their name tag on death.

Naturally Charged Creepers.description: Allows creepers to spawn charged naturally, increasing the game's difficulty.

Nether Portal Spread.description: Nether portals spread (custom) nether blocks to the overworld around the portal in a configurable radius.

No Hostiles Around Campfire.description: Prevent hostile mobs from spawning around the campfire and burn existing mobs when placing a campfire down. With a configurable radius.

Nutritious Milk.description: Adds a nutritious value to milk, filling up the food bar and saturation when consumed.

Omega Mute.description: [Client] The last mod you'll ever need for culling and silencing Minecraft sounds while in-game or via a file.

OP Permission Fallback.description: Players with the minecraft.op permission will be seen as /op(erators) in-game.

Paper Books.description: Allows the creation of books with 9 paper.

Passive Endermen.description: Configurably prevent an enderman from picking up blocks, griefing and attacking players.

Passive Shield.description: The shield is hidden in the offhand until used, and they can passively block damage when held.

Pet Names.description: Gives tamable baby animals a pre-defined name. For Wolves, Cats, Horses, Donkeys, Mules and Llamas.

Placeable Blaze Rods.description: Makes blaze rods placeable as a block in the world, similar to end rods.

Player Death Kick.description: Kicks players on death with a customizable disconnect message.

Player Tracking.description: A PvP mod which allows tracking players via trackers in the world, originally created by mcpvp.

Player Tracking Compass.description: Adds a Tracking Compass, which tracks the nearest player on right click.

Quick Paths.description: Create long paths instantly by setting a start and end point.

Rain Be Gone Ritual.description: Adds the ability to stop the rain with a multi-block structure ritual.

Random Bone Meal Flowers.description: Randomizes the flowers spawned by bone meal, allowing all (modded) types to spawn everywhere.

Random Mob Effects.description: Randomly assigns a potion effect to all hostile mobs in the world. With blacklist and modded effects supported.

Random Sheep Colours.description: Gives new sheep spawns a random wool colour based on a configurable list.

Random Shulker Colours.description: Gives new shulker spawns a random shell colour based on a configurable list.

Random Village Names.description: Gives all villages a random name from a preset list. Uses the Areas mod to display the name in the GUI.

Realistic Bees.description: Makes bees more realistic without adding new objects. Bees are tiny! They have a chance to lose their stinger when stinging a player or entity, and will die after doing so. Stingers can be stuck in players and will need shears to be taken out to prevent further poisoning.

Recast.description: Automatically re-casts the fishing rod for a player when they catch an item.

Recipe Commands.description: Adds the ability to receive the pattern and ingredients of any recipe via chat by a command.

Replanting Crops.description: Automatically replants/replaces/reseeds crops harvested with seeds from drops, negated by holding the sneak button.

Respawning Shulkers.description: Shulkers will respawn on their death location after a configurable delay to make them more sustainable.

Save and Load Inventories.description: Easily save and load inventories by using commands.

Scaffolding Drops Nearby.description: When breaking a scaffolding block, all chained blocks will drop at the first block's position.

Set World Spawn Point.description: Allows setting an exact custom spawn point for newly created worlds.

Shulker Drops Two.description: A minimalistic configurable mod that allows shulkers to drop two or more shells and ignore their default drop chance.

Silence Mobs.description: Adds the functionality to silence a mob with The Silence Stick, which can be collected by transforming a stick via the /silencestick command.

Skeleton Horse Spawn.description: Allows the skeleton horse to spawn naturally with a skeleton riding it and other tweaks.

Sleep Sooner.description: A minimalistic mod that adds a configurable functionality to be able to sleep a little sooner.

Smaller Nether Portals.description: Allows the creation of smaller nether portals, specifically 1x2, 1x3 and 2x2.

Snowballs Freeze Mobs.description: Hitting mobs with a snowball will result in them being frozen for a configurable amount of time.

Softer Hay Bales.description: Makes hay bales negate fall damage entirely, Assassin's Creed style.

Spiders Produce Webs.description: Spiders and cave spiders can periodically produce a web when a player is close.

Stack Refill.description: A quality of life mod which automatically refills the item in the hand of the player when using the final item if possible.

Starter Kit.description: Gives players who join the world for the first time configurable starter gear.

Stray Spawn.description: Allows a chance for strays to spawn naturally everywhere instead of a skeleton.

Superflat World No Slimes.description: Removes those pesky slimes when you're trying to be creative in a superflat world.

Surface Mushrooms.description: Mushrooms can be placed on the surface in daylight and in any brightness.

The Vanilla Experience.description: A mod mirror of the modpack The Vanilla Experience. Includes all the code from all mods and combines it into a single mod. See https://curseforge.com/minecraft/modpacks/the-vanilla-experience for more information.

TNT Breaks Bedrock.description: Allows TNT to break bedrock. Now you've finally got easy access to the nether roof.

Trample Everything.description: A highly configurable mod which makes players trample everything, not just crops.

Transcending Trident.description: Improves the vanilla trident. Hold a water bucket to use riptide, which is more powerful.

Tree Harvester.description: Harvest (nether) trees and giant mushrooms instantly with fast leaf decay and sapling replacement.

Underwater Enchanting.description: Allows the use of the enchantment table under water with maximum levels via bookshelves.

Village Bell Recipe.description: Adds a recipe for the village bell item.

Village Spawn Point.description: Sets the spawn point of a new world to always be in the center of a village.

Villager Death Messages.description: Broadcasts an informational death message whenever a villager passes away.

Villager Names.description: A minimalistic mod which gives all unnamed villagers a (pre-)defined name.

Vote Command.description: Adds a configurable informational /vote command which tells players how and where to vote.

Weaker Spiderwebs.description: Breaks spider webs/cobwebs with a configurable delay when walking through.

Welcome Message.description: An easy to configure welcome message mod for players after login with URL support.

Wool Tweaks.description: Dye beds, wool blocks and beds with a right-click in the world. Adds wool to string recipe for all wool blocks and allows players to dye any colour wool block with any dye.

World Border.description: Allows the creation of a configurable world border for each dimension, limiting the world size.

Your Items Are Safe.description: Generates a chest and armor stand at a player's death location to keep items from despawning. Highly configurable.

Zombie Horse Spawn.description: Allows the zombie horse to spawn with a zombie riding it and other tweaks.

Zombie Proof Doors.description: Prevents zombies from targeting and breaking down doors.

Zombie Villagers From Spawner.description: Puts back the ability for zombie spawners to spawn the villager variant, removed in 1.11.
